items.text: Commit Point is the ticket point students pay to commit to joining the event.
Check-in at the start of the event is required to be eligible for any rewards.
Participants who successfully check in at both the start and mid-point of the event will receive a full refund of their commit points.
Participants who complete all three check-ins (start, mid, and end) will receive a full refund of their commit points, plus a bonus equal to the ticket cost.
For PUBLIC events: No commit points required. Students will receive Reward Points directly for attending.
Budget Point is the total points in the event wallet.
This amount will be reviewed and distributed by University Staff as appropriate.

footer.text: Please ensure you understand these policies before creating an event.
